name: Monster Hunt Text Adventure
description:
Are you our monster exterminator? 

Well, you'll have to do I guess. This house is crawling with them. Be careful, and make sure you carry a sturdy weapon.

This is a short text based adventure/fighting game I created for my class a couple years ago. 

Make choices to stay alive, kill monsters, and rescue humans trapped in the monster house.

IT'S FREE

let me know of any bugs you encounter :)
